Class Message

java.lang.Object
  Message
Direct Known Subclasses:
BitfieldMessage, HaveMessage, Message.ChokeMessage, Message.InterestedMessage, Message.KeepAliveMessage, Message.UnchokeMessage, Message.UninterestedMessage, PieceMessage, RequestMessage
public abstract class Message
extends java.lang.Object

Basic implementation for all messages between peers using the BT protocol.

Nested Class Summary

          Message representing a CHOKE message in the BT protocol.

          Message representing an NOT INTERESTED message in the BT protocol.

Message

public Message(int length,
               byte id)
Message constructor creates a new Abstract Message object

Parameters:
length - The length of a message in bytes

encodeMessage

public static void encodeMessage(Message message,
                                 java.io.DataOutputStream out)
                          throws java.io.IOException
Encodes a message according to BT protocol, and writes to the output stream. The purpose of this is to centralize IO

Parameters:
message - Message object to be encoded according to BT protocol and sent
out - DataOutputStream to send the encoded message along.
Throws:
java.io.IOException

decodeMessage

public static Message decodeMessage(java.io.DataInputStream in)
                             throws java.io.IOException
Decodes a Message sent according to BT protocol and returns the appropriate Message.

Parameters:
in - DataInputStream to read messages from
Returns:
returns appropriate Message object depeneding on message id received.
Throws:
java.io.IOException
